thread.title: Inequality the focus for Hungarian voters ahead of election

title: Inequality the focus for Hungarian voters ahead of election
text:
Inequality the focus for Hungarian voters ahead of election 9:17am EDT - 01:58 
Hungary's Prime Minister, Viktor Orban, is poised to win a third straight term in Sunday's vote, despite a growing unease around the country's widening economic divide. Kate King reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Hungary's Prime Minister, Viktor Orban, is poised to win a third straight term in Sunday's vote, despite a growing unease around the country's widening economic divide. Kate King reports.
